card.name: Absorb

card.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The power of the wild, concentrated in a single charge.

card.property: White spells you cast cost {W} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Its stones seem to serve a healing function, but removing them intact is an exhausting process."—Tolarian research notes

card.name: Alloy Golem
card.property: As Alloy Golem enters the battlefield, choose a color. Alloy Golem is the chosen color. (It's still an artifact.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We turned old weapons into new warriors."—Jhoira, master artificer

card.name: Ancient Kavu

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those with the ability to change their nature survived Phyrexia's biological attacks. Everything else died.

card.name: Ancient Spring
card.property: Ancient Spring enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Ancient Spring: Add {W}{B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Andradite Leech
card.property: Black spells you cast cost {B} more to cast. {B}: Andradite Leech gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Older specimens are completely encrusted with gems, which serve as both armor and weapons."—Tolarian research notes

card.name: Angel of Mercy

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In times like these, people need to be reminded of compassion."—Sisay

card.name: Angelic Shield
card.property: Creatures you control get +0/+1. Sacrifice Angelic Shield: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If only an angel's wings could shelter us all."—Barrin

card.name: Annihilate
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whatever Yawgmoth marks, dies. There is no escape."—Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general

card.name: Archaeological Dig
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Archaeological Dig: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.value: "From shards and splinters I call forth my living horde."—Molimo, maro-sorcerer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Healing is a gift the divine ones have shared with us. It is a sacred trust."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gaea forged her soldiers into self-wielding weapons that struck down all impurities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Darigaaz decided his foe would be more useful as a weapon.

card.property: {3} {U}, {T}: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The detailed dispatch could be summarized in four words: "Time is running out."

card.property: Kicker {2}{W} (You may pay an additional {2}{W} as you cast this spell.) If Benalish Lancer was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with first strike.

card.property: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm up here. You're down there. Now who's the lower life form?"

card.property: Counter target activated ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The battlefield is cluttered enough. Be still."—Multani, maro-sorcerer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I think he sees more than he lets on."—Gerrard

card.name: Blinding Light
card.property: Tap all nonwhite creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An angel's sword impales only the body; her righteousness penetrates the soul.

card.property: {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The stone whispers to me of dragon's fire and darkness. I wish I'd never pried it from the figurehead of that sunken Keldon longship."—Isel, master carver

property.name: Flavor

card.property: {1}: Add {B} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Urborg's magic is strong. Did Urza send you to protect us or to protect against us?"—Urborg witch, to Barrin

card.property: If a source would deal 3 or less damage to Callous Giant, prevent that damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The invasion has awoken slumbering mountains," noted Urza. "Good. We can use all the help we can get."

card.name: Canopy Surge

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Capashen riders were stern and humorless even before their ancestral home was reduced to rubble.

card.property: {T}: Search your library for a legendary card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her leadership forged the Weatherlight's finest crew.

card.name: Cauldron Dance
card.property: Cast Cauldron Dance only during combat. Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step. You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Its controller sacrifices it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Chaotic Strike
card.property: Cast Chaotic Strike only during combat after blockers are declared. Flip a coin. If you win the flip, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let insight and energy be your guides."—The Blind Seer, to Gerrard

property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As a dark rain of Phyrexians fell from the sky, fountains of kavu erupted from the ground.

card.name: Kavu Monarch
card.property: Kavu creatures have trample. Whenever another Kavu enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Kavu Monarch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kavu emerged all across Dominaria, but the first and the strongest came from Yavimaya.

card.name: Kavu Runner
card.property: Kavu Runner has haste as long as no opponent controls a white or blue creature.

card.name: Kavu Scout
card.property: Domain — Kavu Scout gets +1/+0 for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The kavu evolved for centuries deep inside Dominaria, and some can draw from its strength.

card.name: Kavu Titan
card.property: Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.) If Kavu Titan was kicked, it enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it and with trample.

card.name: Keldon Necropolis
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {4}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Keldon Necropolis deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Liberate
card.property: Exile target creature you control. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Lightning Dart
card.property: Lightning Dart deals 1 damage to target creature. If that creature is white or blue, Lightning Dart deals 4 damage to it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Broken and punctured by dozens of Phyrexian portals, the angry sky began to spit lightning back at the world.

card.name: Llanowar Cavalry
card.property: {W}: Llanowar Cavalry gains vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the first time, elves welcomed Benalish soldiers into the forest with something other than arrows.

card.name: Llanowar Elite
card.property: Kicker {8} (You may pay an additional {8} as you cast this spell.) Trample If Llanowar Elite was kicked, it enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Llanowar Knight
card.property: Protection from black

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her armor and steed were borrowed, but her courage was hers alone.

card.name: Llanowar Vanguard
card.property: {T}: Llanowar Vanguard gets +0/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Llanowar rallied around Eladamri's banner and united in his name.

card.name: Loafing Giant
card.property: Whenever Loafing Giant attacks or blocks, put the top card of your library into your graveyard. If that card is a land card, prevent all combat damage Loafing Giant would deal this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Forget it. I'm not getting up today."

card.name: Lobotomy
card.property: Target player reveals his or her hand, then you choose a card other than a basic land card from it. Search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as the chosen card and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Lotus Guardian
card.property: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lotus fields are too valuable to leave undefended.

card.name: Mages' Contest
card.property: You and target spell's controller bid life. You start the bidding with a bid of 1. In turn order, each player may top the high bid. The bidding ends if the high bid stands. The high bidder loses life equal to the high bid. If you win the bidding, counter that spell.

card.name: Mana Maze
card.property: Players can't cast spells that share a color with the spell most recently cast this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who know only one path to victory can never hope to triumph."—The Blind Seer

card.name: Maniacal Rage
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Remember me?" Tahngarth roared. "Now I'll repay you for my stay on Rath"

card.name: Manipulate Fate
card.property: Search your library for three cards, exile them, then shuffle your library. Draw a card.

card.name: Marauding Knight
card.property: Protection from white Marauding Knight gets +1/+1 for each Plains your opponents control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They ride our trails as if they were designed to," said the guard."They were," replied Gerrard.

card.name: Metathran Aerostat
card.property: Flying {X}{U}: You may put a creature card with converted mana cost X from your hand onto the battlefield. If you do, return Metathran Aerostat to its owner's hand.

card.name: Metathran Transport
card.property: Flying Metathran Transport can't be blocked by blue creatures. {U}: Target creature becomes blue until end of turn.

card.name: Metathran Zombie
card.property: {B}: Regenerate Metathran Zombie.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rise, metathran. You shall serve a nobler cause in death."—Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general

card.name: Meteor Storm

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The storm wasn't an omen. It was the fulfillment of one.

card.name: Might Weaver
card.property: {2}: Target red or white creature gains trample until end of turn. (If the creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

card.name: Molimo, Maro-Sorcerer
card.property: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.) Molimo, Maro-Sorcerer's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.

card.property: ({T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.)

card.property: ({T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Barrin waited for the nausea to pass or for Urza to say something else. He waited in vain.

card.name: Nightscape Apprentice
card.property: {U}, {T}: Put target creature you control on top of its owner's library. {R}, {T}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Nightscape Master
Noble Panther
card.property: {1}: Noble Panther gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unlike many hunters, these panthers have no need for camouflage. They're fast enough to catch any prey.

card.name: Nomadic Elf
card.property: {1} {G}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've journeyed across Dominaria. Phyrexians are everywhere. Plague is everywhere. There's no place left to hide."

card.name: Obliterate
card.property: Obliterate can't be countered. Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and lands. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For his family, Barrin made a funeral pyre of Tolaria.

card.name: Obsidian Acolyte
card.property: Protection from black {W}: Target creature gains protection from black until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The truthful will stand in the gaze of death and escape unharmed.—Obsidian acolyte creed

card.name: Opt
card.property: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) Draw a card.

card.name: Ordered Migration
card.property: Domain — Create a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Birds reach all parts of the world," said Barrin. "They will make excellent scouts."

card.name: Orim's Touch

card.name: Overabundance
card.property: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana to his or her mana pool of any type that land produced, and Overabundance deals 1 damage to him or her.

card.property: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Destroy target artifact if its converted mana cost is 2 or less. If Overload was kicked, destroy that artifact if its converted mana cost is 5 or less instead.

card.name: Pain // Suffering
Phantasmal Terrain
card.property: Enchant land As Phantasmal Terrain enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type. Enchanted land is the chosen type.

card.name: Phyrexian Altar
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your life was meaningless, but your death will glorify Yawgmoth."—Tsabo Tavoc

card.name: Phyrexian Battleflies
card.property: Flying {B}: Phyrexian Battleflies gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than twice each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After encountering them, Squee finally lost his appetite for bugs.

card.name: Phyrexian Delver
card.property: When Phyrexian Delver enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to that card's converted mana cost.

card.name: Phyrexian Infiltrator

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is Yawgmoth's will incarnate: an efficient machine that replaces inefficient flesh."—Tsabo Tavoc

card.name: Phyrexian Lens
card.property: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's nothing I wouldn't give to achieve victory. Can you say the same?"—Tsabo Tavoc, to Gerrard

card.name: Phyrexian Reaper
card.property: Whenever Phyrexian Reaper becomes blocked by a green creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It desires only to help others shed the itchy wet skin of life.

card.name: Phyrexian Slayer
card.property: Flying Whenever Phyrexian Slayer becomes blocked by a white creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Benalia was only the first nation victimized by Tsabo Tavoc's specialized killers.

card.name: Pincer Spider
card.property: Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.) Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) If Pincer Spider was kicked, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Plague Spitter
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, Plague Spitter deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. When Plague Spitter dies, Plague Spitter deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Plague Spores
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature and target land. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Breathe deep, Dominaria. Breathe deep and die."—Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sky split, and the air crackled and roiled. The Phyrexian invasion of Dominaria had finally begun.

card.name: Pledge of Loyalty
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has protection from the colors of permanents you control. This effect doesn't remove Pledge of Loyalty.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza convinced many Dominarians not only to set aside their differences, but to embrace them.

card.name: Pouncing Kavu
card.property: Kicker {2}{R} (You may pay an additional {2}{R} as you cast this spell.) First strike If Pouncing Kavu was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with haste.

card.name: Prison Barricade

card.name: Probe
card.property: Kicker {1}{B} (You may pay an additional {1}{B} as you cast this spell.) Draw three cards, then discard two cards. If Probe was kicked, target player discards two cards.

card.property: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Counter target spell if its converted mana cost is 2 or less. If Prohibit was kicked, counter that spell if its converted mana cost is 4 or less instead.

card.name: Protective Sphere
card.property: {1}, Pay 1 life: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by a source of your choice that shares a color with the mana spent on this activation cost. (Colorless mana prevents no damage.)

card.name: Psychic Battle
card.property: Whenever a player chooses one or more targets, each player reveals the top card of his or her library. The player who reveals the card with the highest converted mana cost may change the target or targets. If two or more cards are tied for highest cost, the target or targets remain unchanged. Changing targets this way doesn't trigger abilities of permanents named Psychic Battle.

card.name: Pulse of Llanowar
card.property: If a basic land you control is tapped for mana, it produces mana of a color of your choice instead of any other type.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Gaea's memory is eternal, and she exists in all things."—Molimo, maro-sorcerer

card.name: Pure Reflection
card.property: Whenever a player casts a creature spell, destroy all Reflections. Then that player creates an X/X white Reflection creature token, where X is the converted mana cost of that spell.

card.name: Pyre Zombie

card.name: Quirion Elves
card.property: As Quirion Elves enters the battlefield, choose a color. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. {T}: Add one mana of the chosen color to your mana pool.

card.name: Quirion Sentinel
card.property: When Quirion Sentinel enters the battlefield, add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All elvenkind stood against Phyrexia. The Quirion nation deployed its most spiritual adepts, who wielded the power of their native soil.

card.name: Quirion Trailblazer
card.property: When Quirion Trailblazer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. If you do, shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All that matters is the path ahead."

card.name: Rage Weaver
card.property: {2}: Target black or green creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

card.name: Raging Kavu
card.property: Flash Haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It took Yavimaya a thousand years to breed them, but it took only seconds for them to prove their worth.

card.name: Rainbow Crow
card.property: Flying {1}: Rainbow Crow becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Children claim no two feathers are exactly the same color, then eagerly gather them for proof.

card.name: Rampant Elephant
card.property: {G}: Target creature blocks Rampant Elephant this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No matter how righteous the cause, it helps to bring along some muscle.

card.name: Ravenous Rats
card.property: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing is sacred to the rats. Everything is simply another meal.

card.name: Razorfoot Griffin
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do griffins fight to defend their homes or purely for sport?"—Sisay

card.name: Reckless Assault
card.property: {1}, Pay 2 life: Reckless Assault deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How will you fight an enemy that cares nothing for itself?"—The Blind Seer

card.name: Reckless Spite
card.property: Destroy two target nonblack creatures. You lose 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death is such an exquisite sensation."—Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general

card.name: Recoil
card.property: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Then that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Anything sent into a plagued world is bound to come back infected.

card.name: Recover
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Barrin exhumed his daughter's body, he finally realized the full price of his faith in Urza.

card.name: Repulse
card.property: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

card.name: Restock
card.property: Return two target cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Restock.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We hid such stockpiles all over Rath. We should continue that practice here."—Lin Sivvi

card.name: Restrain
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking creature this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hanna would give up her own life before she'd abandon the Weatherlight."—Sisay

card.name: Reviving Dose
card.property: You gain 3 life. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As healers battled each plague, they learned more about the next.

card.name: Reviving Vapors
card.property: Reveal the top three cards of your library and put one of them into your hand. You gain life equal to that card's converted mana cost. Put all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.

card.name: Rewards of Diversity
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a multicolored spell, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Everything is in place. Nothing can happen that isn't part of my plan."—Urza

card.name: Reya Dawnbringer
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A beacon of hope for a battered army.

card.name: Riptide Crab
card.property: Vigilance When Riptide Crab dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It sleeps with its claws open.

card.name: Rith's Attendant
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice Rith's Attendant: Add {R}{G}{W} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rith is the claw of the ur-dragon, scattering seeds of devastation."

card.name: Rith, the Awakener

card.name: Rogue Kavu
card.property: Whenever Rogue Kavu attacks alone, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I know how this one feels," said Urza. "It's not like others of its kind and has been shunned for its differences."

card.name: Rooting Kavu
card.property: When Rooting Kavu dies, you may exile it. If you do, shuffle all creature cards from your graveyard into your library.

card.name: Rout

card.name: Ruby Leech

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Its gems didn't stop pulsating until they were completely removed."—Tolarian research notes

card.name: Ruham Djinn
card.property: First strike Ruham Djinn gets -2/-2 as long as white is the most common color among all permanents or is tied for most common.

card.name: Sabertooth Nishoba
card.property: Trample, protection from blue and from red

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They sneer at the terrestrial dangers found on peaks and shores, eager to prove themselves against new and even mightier foes.

card.name: Salt Marsh
card.property: Salt Marsh enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only death breeds in stagnant water.—Urborg saying

card.name: Samite Archer
card.property: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. {T}: Samite Archer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can preserve ten lives by taking one."

card.name: Samite Ministration
card.property: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by a source of your choice. Whenever damage from a black or red source is prevented this way this turn, you gain that much life.

card.name: Sapphire Leech
card.property: Flying Blue spells you cast cost {U} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The subject's wings are clearly vestigial. We suspect the gems somehow keep it aloft."—Tolarian research notes

card.name: Saproling Infestation
card.property: Whenever a player kicks a spell, you create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My army took centuries to gather," remarked Urza. "Yavimaya seems to conjure hers out of thin air."

card.name: Saproling Symbiosis
card.property: You may cast Saproling Symbiosis as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.) Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token for each creature you control.

card.name: Savage Offensive
card.property: Kicker {G} (You may pay an additional {G} as you cast this spell.) Creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn. If Savage Offensive was kicked, they get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Scarred Puma
card.property: Scarred Puma can't attack unless a black or green creature also attacks.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's not eager to lose the other eye.

card.name: Scavenged Weaponry
card.property: Enchant creature When Scavenged Weaponry enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Phyrexians have progressed," admired Urza. "Their parts are interchangeable."

card.name: Scorching Lava
card.property: Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.) Scorching Lava deals 2 damage to target creature or player. If Scorching Lava was kicked, that creature can't be regenerated this turn and if it would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Scouting Trek
card.property: Search your library for any number of basic land cards. Reveal those cards, then shuffle your library and put them on top of it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have chosen my path. Who will walk it with me?"—Eladamri

card.name: Searing Rays

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is a battle of pawns, for the highest stakes imaginable."—Urza

card.name: Seashell Cameo
card.property: {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Today a seashell fell from the empty sky here in Kinymu, a hundred leagues from the sea. I'm torn—shall I carve a woman or a bird?"—Isel, master carver

card.name: Seer's Vision
card.property: Your opponents play with their hands revealed. Sacrifice Seer's Vision: Look at target player's hand and choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Serpentine Kavu
card.property: {R}: Serpentine Kavu gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Under Yavimaya's peaceful facade beat the hearts of many savage beasts.

card.name: Shackles
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. {W}: Return Shackles to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It could be worse," said Gerrard, looking around. "Well, maybe not."

card.name: Shimmering Wings

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wings are but fins for swimming the sky."—Empress Galina

card.name: Shivan Emissary
card.property: Kicker {1}{B} (You may pay an additional {1}{B} as you cast this spell.) When Shivan Emissary enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Shivan Harvest
card.property: {1} {R}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target nonbasic land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The blood of your ancestors ran heavy on this soil. Now it's your turn to sacrifice for the glory of Shiv."—Viashino heretic

card.name: Shivan Oasis
card.property: Shivan Oasis enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the hardiest explorers survive to eat the fruit.

card.name: Shivan Zombie
card.property: Protection from white

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Barbarians long for a glorious death in battle. Phyrexia was eager to grant that wish.

card.name: Shoreline Raider
card.property: Protection from Kavu

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This strange new beast makes for an excellent meal. Get me more."—Empress Galina

card.name: Simoon
card.property: Simoon deals 1 damage to each creature target opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hot wind whipped up as if the weather itself wanted to fight Phyrexians.

card.name: Skittish Kavu
card.property: Skittish Kavu gets +1/+1 as long as no opponent controls a white or blue creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fierce when roused, this breed of kavu is easily distracted by a strong voice or melodic tune.

card.name: Skizzik

card.name: Sleeper's Robe

card.name: Slimy Kavu

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its slime liquefies the ground as efficiently as its fangs shred prey.

card.name: Slinking Serpent
card.property: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It winds its way through undergrowth as easily as it swims through shallows.

card.name: Smoldering Tar

card.name: Soul Burn
card.property: Spend only black and/or red mana on X. Soul Burn deals X damage to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more than the amount of {B} spent on X, the player's life total before Soul Burn dealt damage, or the creature's toughness.

card.name: Sparring Golem

card.name: Spirit of Resistance
card.property: As long as you control a permanent of each color, prevent all damage that would be dealt to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our victory must come from all of Dominaria, or it will not come."—Urza

card.property: {2}: Target green or blue creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Each attacking creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gaea battles rampant death with abundant life.

card.name: Tectonic Instability
card.property: Whenever a land enters the battlefield, tap all lands its controller controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Think of the problems we'll face if you uproot entire continents," said Urza."I have," replied Teferi, "but the alternative is worse."

card.name: Teferi's Care
card.property: {W}, Sacrifice an enchantment: Destroy target enchantment. {3}{U}{U}: Counter target enchantment spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If I do nothing else, I will protect my people."—Teferi

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Isolation is not the answer."—Urza, to Teferi.

card.name: Teferi's Response
card.property: Counter target spell or ability an opponent controls that targets a land you control. If a permanent's ability is countered this way, destroy that permanent. Draw two cards.

card.name: Tek
card.property: Tek gets +0/+2 as long as you control a Plains, has flying as long as you control an Island, gets +2/+0 as long as you control a Swamp, has first strike as long as you control a Mountain, and has trample as long as you control a Forest.

card.name: Temporal Distortion
card.property: Whenever a creature or land becomes tapped, put an hourglass counter on it. Each permanent with an hourglass counter on it doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, remove all hourglass counters from permanents that player controls.

card.name: Thicket Elemental
card.property: Kicker {1}{G} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} as you cast this spell.) When Thicket Elemental enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, you may reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. If you do, put that card onto the battlefield and shuffle all other cards revealed this way into your library.

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor

property.value: "I found a troll-horn fragment in the wooded foothills of Hurloon, and it keeps growing larger. I wonder, is the horn recreating itself or the troll?"—Isel, master carver

property.name: Flavor

card.name: Tsabo's Assassin
card.property: {T}: Destroy target creature if it shares a color with the most common color among all permanents or a color tied for most common. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor

card.name: Urborg Emissary

property.name: Flavor

card.name: Urza's Filter
card.property: Multicolored spells cost up to {2} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a tool for aiding my other tools," explained Urza. "Now they'll work in harmony."

card.name: Urza's Rage
card.property: Kicker {8}{R} (You may pay an additional {8}{R} as you cast this spell.) Urza's Rage can't be countered by spells or abilities. Urza's Rage deals 3 damage to target creature or player. If Urza's Rage was kicked, instead it deals 10 damage to that creature or player and the damage can't be prevented.

card.name: Utopia Tree
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor

card.name: Vigorous Charge

property.name: Flavor

property.value: Not all elves embrace the pastoral life. Some still roam the forest's edge, forever making war against their hated enemies.
